head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JARETT, LAWRENCE, DR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JARETT, LAWRENCE, DR.

block.p: JARETT-Lawrence, Dr. Temple Sinai of Roslyn records with profound sorrow the death of our cherished and devoted member Dr. Lawrence Jarett. We extend our deepest condolences to his family. Services will be held at Temple Sinai of Roslyn, Friday at 12:00 Noon. Rabbi Michael White Rabbi Norman Kahan, Emeritus Michael J. Paul, President
